website_summaries.verdict: Though it's entirely redundant for the smartphone-equipped family, the Nucleus works well enough as a feature-rich intercom to be worthwhile if you want to check on elderly parents or small children.
pros: The Nucleus Anywhere Intercom makes video calls easy and connects calls without waiting for the recipient to pick up
With Amazon's Alexa, you can make calls with your voice or use the Nucleus to control your smart home
cons: You don't need a Nucleus if the people you want to talk to have a smartphone
The touchscreen is underused and the call quality isn't any better than you get from a number of free apps for video calls

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound - Not always responsive.
customer_reviews.text: This item suffers from two problems; the sound quality is absolutely horrible. In this day and age such poor sound quality is unacceptable. Adding another $20 to the cost could have upgraded the sound - if not for even less. Also, sometimes the unit does not respond to the 'Alexa' wake up call. Even yelling doesn't trigger the system. I'm disappointed in this unit. Even though I want to support young entrepreneurs, this one need a re-think. May return it - not sure. Amazon is at fault here for allowing a product to share their technology with such poor audio performance. Where are the standards??? This product makes the entire Echo line look bad.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vargo

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for about 6 months and then it started having several issues. Video cuts out on distant end and device must be restarted to restore it. The night light comes on even in a lighted room and the call has to be restarted to fix this. The audio and video quality were never good, but now this device is pretty unusable. I have to buy another solution to let my toddler video chat with my Grandma...
customer_reviews.author: beedle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: After having our Nucleus for two and a half years, I finally decided to take the time to write a review. We've never really liked this system. It's never worked very well with any of our phones, Samsung or Apple. We've gone through multiple modems in our home as well. The connection during calls is always choppy and freezes constantly. It's so frustrating we had to tell our kids not to call us unless someone was dying. Now Nucleus is saying they are going to a subscription based service. So we are officially done with this device and will find something else. It's been a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: karli hughes

customer_reviews.title: The volume is so low, they are worthless.
customer_reviews.text: This was a disappointing purchase. I waited until Prime day to purchase two of these units. My goal was to cut down on yelling across our rather long house. After setting the units up, it was clear that I could have saved my money and bought a megaphone. The audio quality is poor (think CB radio circa 1985) and the volume was so low, that unless the person you were speaking to was directly beside the unit, they wouldn’t hear your voice. We cranked them both up, and they were still worthless. Kudos to Amazon for allowing me to return despite missing the return window by a day.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: First impressions: A+
customer_reviews.text: First blush: I can share with you that I had relatively little trouble working through the guided setup. I suspect that my granddaughters (14 y/o) would probably do better and faster. This suggests that the eventual user base may vary widely with respect to technical comfort. I would suggest they may want to consider some triage-like online help. The included "instructions" are refreshingly brief. That is good news. Of course the Intercom guided on-screen introduction augments the printed instructions. But, how will this work with the ingenue who can read the instructions but fails to connect? Only time will tell. Stay tuned for more comments after we have lived with this for a while.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: buggy, drops calls on same wifi
customer_reviews.text: tech savvy guy, wanted easy way for kids to call my iphone. works if on cell data but oddly not if cell phone is on same wifi network as device. often home screen doesn’t list my cell or my wife’s cell. just lists setup options then one of the cell options may pop in periodically. really liked the idea. works ~10% of the time and is very neat when i get a connection. hopefully next generation will work consistently because the idea has a lot of potential.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: way better then the amazon one since you dont actually have ...
customer_reviews.text: way better then the amazon one since you dont actually have to pick it up or click answer. needed this to check my grandparents as they wont even touch anything technology wise. This allows me to check on them like a security camera but they can see me at the same time. my only complaint is that the app doesnt work on a desktop pc or mac so im stuck looking at it through a tiny android or iphone screen.
customer_reviews.author: susan may

customer_reviews.title: App doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Id give it no stars if that was an option. The android app doesn't work, it won't receive push notifications unless you have the app open & phone on(not standby or screen locked). Basically has become a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend it, Alexa is not functioning property on this ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend it , Alexa is not functioning property on this device .
customer_reviews.author: Renee smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to setup. Updates automatically. Have 2 of them. Got because of elderly father & it has been terrific. Plan on getting more soon. Hate that Amazon seems to have pilfered their concept, wish they had just partnered with Nucleus. Anyway have always loved Amazon products but for this am sticking with the original it is really different from Amazons version & more what I need also less confusing for my elderly father.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep in touch with elderly people, poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with customer service for this device. The only option I found to contact them was via email and after doing so I never received a reply to resolve my problem. I still have not figured out why my mobile phone wont ring when someone with an intercom calls me. I'd only recommend this for someone that has an elderly parent that they need to check in with throughout the day. Pro: Easy for an elderly person to use, Drop in feature is great for checking on kids, pets, etc, Works as an extension to Alexa, Nice design. Cons: Video is grainy, slight delay when speaking, does not work well with mobile app, poor customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis T Menace

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable
customer_reviews.text: These were so disappointing. Their performance was flaky to the point of being laughable, and unusable. The would constantly disconnect. The other devices would disappear from the list, then reappear several minutes later. Occasionally we got a good strong video conference working, but more often starting a video feed would seem to crash the device. We have a good strong home network, I gave priority routing to the devices, nothing helped. Also I had the impression we could have Alexa play the same music on all the devices at once, but it's per device with no synchronization. These feel half baked at best. Had to return all five, and must consider buying the competitors' much more expensive devices.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: The video quality is mediocre at best. The audio quality is just terrible and to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these units a couple months back. Unfortunately the hype did not live up to reality. The video quality is mediocre at best. The audio quality is just terrible and to make it worse, there's a noticeable delay in audio of about 1 second or more. This is even the case in units which are in side by side rooms. WiFi connections drop at random intervals which requires the unit to be restarted. There are also instances of freezing which also requires a restart. I regret purchasing the Nucleus and would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: Allowed us to contact family
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandpa's birthday a year before he passed. I set it to auto answer as he had no idea how to use anything but the home phone and TV remote. It was always great to see how happy he would get when he saw our faces pop up. It was also simple enough for grandma to use, as all she had to do was touch the pictures of family. Still use this with grandma. Now I'm getting a Ring doorbell to use with this because she lives alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better Customer service Support!
customer_reviews.text: Great intercom-external communication device! Easy to setup, easy for even the techie challanged to use. What is more amazing is the support that is second to none! I received an email after sign up welcoming me to the Nucleus family,the same day my cat ate the power cord as a snack. I emailed back just to ask how much a new power cable would be and within a few minutes Customer Service responded that they will ship me a new cable, No Charge!! They actually sent me 2 cables (just in case my cat gets hungry again! )
customer_reviews.author: Dougflyer

customer_reviews.title: No support at all!!
customer_reviews.text: You will unfortunately be very disappointed if you are buying this device to communicate with loved ones using the app. I've had many issues with their online application from trying download it, to trying to login using the same username and password, to adding a picture... contacted their help/support team, but no answers. You'll be on your own. It's definitely going back to Amazon today.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: OK as Ring doorbell intercom -- UPDATE: not anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device deeply discounted and only for the purpose of answering my Ring Doorbell. It works okay, even though I would have preferred to see the doorbell video stream immediately on screen after a doorbell press instead of pressing a button first. Its hardware is too slow for a smooth Alexa experience and the whole device is based on proprietary software so apart from Ring and intercom between multiple units there are no other applications. UPDATE: Nucleus is dropping Ring doorbell support for this device. It is now a doorstop.
customer_reviews.author: Catlover

customer_reviews.title: Timely
customer_reviews.text: Had some trouble staying on line at first but have had for over two months and am very happy. When they partnered with Ring it was a bonus wish come true. I still can't receive a page on my cell but I can on my tablet if I can get line . I can contact my parent from my cell but he cannot ring me on it. Still the best thing to happen in my ongoing ability to work and care for an elderly parent. Thank you Nucleus and Ring.
customer_reviews.author: d.

customer_reviews.title: No longer worth buying - upcoming conversion to subscription
customer_reviews.text: I bought three devices in 2017 because there was no monthly fees -- now all my screens are telling me the devices will become inoperable if I don't elect to pay them monthly fees per device. At least give us an option to use a LAN only solution, or to host a server in our home so we can manage device communication! Sad...looks like these are going in the garbage unless someone was nice enough to provide modified firmware that bypasses the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Amazon

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. It is a piece of junk. I bought six of them and none of them work the way they're supposed to. The timing and dates is very difficult to correct the time in in dates are always off, the speaker it's terrible, and if you hook up more then 2 of these items you're going to have major trouble trying to communicate with your family from one room to another room.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Priceless
customer_reviews.text: Works great, especially on auto answer for an older person. We have been able to check on my husband's mother when her phones are down or we just worried because we couldn't reach her. Priceless . She loves the huge clock on the front and being able to ask Alexa the weather or to play music
customer_reviews.author: R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: fail
customer_reviews.text: Excitement turns to dissapointment. Everything was going great ultil J tried to connect to Alexa... Kept getting an error "http 503 error" before even being able to put a username and password in. I TRIED RESETTING TO FACTORY DEFAULTS AND trying again and then after connecting to my internet it kept giving a pop up messag saying " device not connected to internet" I tried a hotspot on my phone to eliminate router issues, no luck. what a waste of time, do the people that make this stuff even test it out first?
customer_reviews.author: AWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Forcing a subscription based update? Betrayal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically because once purchased, they were mine to use as i saw fit. I have been willing to overlook the other myriad of issues in the meantime. But recently the devices have been notifying me that soon the software will be subscription based only. I’ve had these for 3 years and this forced change is unacceptable. Lucky for them, the return window is closed or I’d be sending these clunky, faulty, hunks of junk back.
customer_reviews.author: Angel M May

customer_reviews.title: Great idea BUT needs A LOT of work
customer_reviews.text: Thank God I didn't pay full price for mine. For starters, the sound quality is some of the worst I have EVER heard. I've purchased cheap Bluetooth speakers for $10 that sound better so that is a huge disappointment. Most importantly, to try and obtain detailed support is LITERALLY impossible. It can only be done via email as they have no escalation path and a direct line to support. I had to trade maybe 6-8 emails with someone named Kati P before I finally gave up. I messaged BOTH the founder Jonathan Frankel and the CTO Isaac Levy and neither of them after almost a week, have responded. Lesson learned on many levels.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch!
customer_reviews.text: Stay clear away from this product and company. I bought 4 units for around the house. That's not an insubstantial amount of money. Now they're telling me that they're going to shut them off if I don't also buy a subscription. I understand that subscriptions can be necessary for things like servers, but no servers should even be involved for me to connect to another device on the same network. I guess they weren't selling enough new units and decided they wanted to start milking their current customers. Shameful.
customer_reviews.author: KY Jelly

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for seniors
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for seniors! My grandmother is extremely technologically challenged. She can't Skype. She barely understands the phone. However now all of her children have the ability to see her face to face all over the country. If she doesn't answer the phone, I can video call her to make sure she is ok. I call and the camera comes on without her having to do anything. This is absolutely ideal for seniors. Additionally the staff is extremely attentive and works hard to answer questions personally and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: S. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: We just love our Nucleus! I have one upstairs on the kitchen counter and one in the basement. It has become the go to if we want to get ahold of the kids. Sometimes if I’m in bed and forget to check the basement I’ll call it and see that all the lights are on. The kids can hear me in their rooms from the nucleus. It’s clear and loud enough no matter where they are. If you are thinking about it you can stop because it’s awesome. We’re getting a few more for other parts of the house too.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl wallace

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE product...don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a birthday gift from a family member. After reading all the reviews, I’ve had all the same problems. Video chat works sometimes...at best. Don’t even try to use Alexa. When I ask Alexa to play music it will play one or two songs and then stop. Currently it is just something that takes up space on my counter (which is something nobody needs). With all the other options out there now, this product needs a complete overhaul...especially with its price point! This is one time when buying something more expensive is NOT worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money here!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 for my house as a video intercom, really unstable platform, Alexa only works if you switch the “Alexa” button off, then back on... every time, every intercom. Ring quit working with it as well. Now a message just popped up adding a monthly fee to continue using it or it will stop working!! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USED to be Great.  Now it’s just like any other camera.  BIG waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This USED TO work great. Have it in elderly parents room and from there she was able to call us on our cell any time. NOW this feature DOES NOT WORK. Instead, a pop up appears on the screen saying the the person she tried to call has not updated their app on the phone. BS. I have the most recent version of the app. The capability to call directly from the device is gone.
customer_reviews.author: MyF

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for better
customer_reviews.text: Hoped for better. Looks good on the outside. I constantly have to reboot the devices to get them to work. I can be in the middle of a conversation and it will lock up and need restarting. At times when i need to talk to a room it will show off line while others show on line. Using POE and still can only connect via wifi for whatever reason. Have my phone set up with the system via the app but only I can communicate to the stations...The stations cannot call me unless im sitting with my phone on and the app open. Would be nice if it worked both ways. Great when it works but not real happy.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H Petrie

customer_reviews.title: So I looked for an intercom like Nucleus, but could not find one until I ...
customer_reviews.text: When I was working in NYC, my wife was home by herself. She has MS. When I did not receive my morning call from her, I was worried. She was not answering the phone. So I looked for an intercom like Nucleus, but could not find one until I was in Lowes. I bought three. Now I can check in on my wife at any time. I am retired now, but having fun with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Craddock

customer_reviews.title: New subscription requirement?
customer_reviews.text: I was just just informed that this monitor is going to require some sort of "subscription" now. What? Yet, can't find any information on the web about it.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Changing to paid subscription or brick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 3 of these for 3 years, they have never upgraded the software or added any features; and all of the sudden I’m getting a prompt that says the software will not function anymore if I don’t start paying $5 a month
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Menjivar

customer_reviews.title: Junk and a scam!
customer_reviews.text: These things are a huge waste of money! I purchased 15 of them for video intercom throughout my house and 2 of them the camera stopped working and now all of a sudden they’re saying I have to have a subscription for them to continue working!?!?! What a scam! On top of all that if you have a power outage you have to go through and turn each one back one! Ridiculous! Please save your money and find an alternative to these!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Eastwood

customer_reviews.title: Worst investment I made for my home.
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed with this product and their service that suppose to back it. I had purchased 6 of these units for my home and hard wired them to the walls. Ring doorbell is no longer available, I’ve emailed them 2 times and still no one reached back out to me, some devices are offline then reappears when it wants to, Alexa doesn’t work unless you wake her up by walking to the device and turning her off and then on, and my final comment.... they are now moving into a subscription service. How about if you fixed the first few problems and you would have had our subscription. This device is garbage I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LJDJS

customer_reviews.title: Had for 10 months - only worked properly for 6 of them
customer_reviews.text: At first, the Nucleus worked great for us. I could easily view what was going on at home while I was the office. But, in June, I upgraded my phone to the Samsung 8+ with Android Nougat installed. Here we are, 4 months later and Nucleus STILL has not been able or willing to get their product to work with this newest OS.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep an eye on the kids and animals
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our family, we are able to communicate with our children who don't yet have cell phones. Love that you can call the unit at home from a cell phone and vice versa. We also use it as an intercom throughout the house when I don't feel like yelling upstairs to the kids. If I ever have a question about the technology the company is quick to respond with help and have gone above and beyond to make sure that our units work to our satisfaction. Highly recommend the company and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CONCEPT BUT DOESN'T FUNCTION AS PROMISED
customer_reviews.text: Such a great idea but it does not function properly and is an absolute waste of time and money. The picture freezes, audio cuts out and both audio and video become pixelated. It is very frustrating. It is so frustrating that my family refuses to use it. I would return it if I could, but I kept hoping that the bugs would get worked out and it would function as it should. It has not, so I guess this one is on me. I will call manufacturer and see if they can offer some assistance.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Great intercom system
customer_reviews.text: I love these intercoms, they work really well. Sometimes I have issues with one of them being offline, but I think that is related to the PoE setup I have. FYI, you are stuck with 'Alexa' as the key phrase for the Amazon Alexa integration, apparently Amazon doesn't allow third party vendors to setup different key words, unline their own devices. I had to turn this feature off because my eldest daughter is named Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great...affordable investment!
customer_reviews.text: So I got this nucleus because this was the first year that my oldest would be coming home by himself instead of going to aftercare, and I must say that it has been wonderful! I’m able to drop in on him at anytime and that is gives me a ton of reassurance. It’s a great investment if you’re trying to stay in touch with a loved one.
customer_reviews.author: HowardGang

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected it to be. I think the concept is awesome, but the camera quality and the sound wasn't up to par. I have fully smart homed my house out with multiple cameras and gadgets, and I was looking to add this as an intercom system, but was disappointed. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nevelus

customer_reviews.title: This froze up when I tried to set it up ...
customer_reviews.text: This froze up when I tried to set it up and I could not do anything with it. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for a house with lots of stairs.
customer_reviews.text: We have been very pleased with these intercom units. Don't expect 1080 video and high fidelity sound. What you will get is an intercom that works on WIFI (needs a power cord), and can dial and receive calls on your phone. I will buy another unit for my Mom.
customer_reviews.author: KohalaTom

customer_reviews.title: NO LONGER SUPPORTED
customer_reviews.text: The company went out of business and no longer supports the device. If you have an apple device, you can still use some of the features, but not all. If you have an android device, you are 100% out of luck in you wanted to check in while out of the house. I only purchased one as a test, so I can't comment on call or video quality or in home, device to device connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition For Second Floor
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these so that my wife could call the kids from downstairs. And she can see them, too!
customer_reviews.author: 8AA2YM

customer_reviews.title: have set up to allow for direct connection to father ...
customer_reviews.text: have set up to allow for direct connection to father with stroke damage. could not manage facetime on ipad but can seem to manage incoming communications - has not tried to call out. Often on the phone dad would say see this, well now I should be able to see what he's talking about. Needs to integrate with Ring and collect lists of who has called.
customer_reviews.author: AlisonPlays

customer_reviews.title: Cant survive power outages for some reason
customer_reviews.text: Had a power failure and now it doesnt work. Had it plugged in a gfci and afci circuit but still fried it I guess. Wasnt good for much, kind of a waste of money sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked exactly how i needed it to.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, worked perfectly for leaving the kids at home for the first time by themselves. They checked in so much, I wanted to turn the privacy button on! One thin i noticed, I couldn't connect with them when I wasnt on a wifi. I've had the product less than a week, so we will see how well it works as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: shargurl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that can be used by a 3yo :-)
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. My 3 yo son is able to call me and the entire family on theirsmartphones. Product was just launched, so still a few glitches here and there, but support is very active and fixes were pushed fast to the appstores (iOS and Google Play).
customer_reviews.author: alexh

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to use with Ring.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with Ring. Now it's a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: the kids have a great time using the device especially when you have a ...
customer_reviews.text: The functionality of the device works well. the kids have a great time using the device especially when you have a large home and we don't have to shout "dinner time" The least thing i don't like is the power cord. I mounted our on the wall but I have to see the cord running down from the device. The promotional video seems to be misleading because at times I see the device powered with no power cable connected to it. There is no explanation for the use of the other USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Jose G.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not quite there
customer_reviews.text: I think the Nucleus has a lot of promise but it's not quite there yet. I agree with all of the previous comments by others having experienced all of the issues mentioned. The camera lighting / picture can be dark depending on the lighting and contrast in the room you are viewing. Setup was pretty easy. My Echo/Alexa hangs in listening mode and I have to unplug to reset so I've shut that feature off for now. We have a big property with multiple buildings so the intercom is very useful but the mobile app seems to have to be open on your phone to receive a call. I'm hoping it keeps getting better with updates like the Tesla does
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Connections
customer_reviews.text: The first one that I ordered was found to be defective but that does happen sometimes with lot's of things. The replacement was fine but I had a problem setting up an account and password. My son-in-law linked it to my daughter's Nucleus and it works now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition.
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to check in with my pup while I am out and the intercom feature is helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy and very usefull
customer_reviews.text: We needed an easy to install camera/monitor system so we could check in our kids and babysitter when we go out with friends. This thing is perfect for us. Plus the kids love calling us all day long. Super easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Happy mommy

customer_reviews.title: Chatting with Grandma
customer_reviews.text: Love it my children 12,9,3, 1year old twins have already called grandma and she enjoys seeing and hearing from them love how easy it is to use and can't wait to see what features are added in the future
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VEEY disappointing. Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: Too many promises with no follow through. Alexa is a bust, doesn’t respond when activated, responds when not activated. Video and audio are worse that poor. The room has to be bright to see anything. Bought 3 of them and was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Maglietti

customer_reviews.title: I have one on each floor and they work very ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one on each floor and they work very well. I no longer have to yell to call my family downstairs at meal time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Z

customer_reviews.title: App Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great unit to unit but the android app which is essentially necessary to use this unit with anyone else is useless. They sucker you into buying the unit and then supply junk to use it with.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Behm

customer_reviews.title: Early version. Needs updating.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few years ago. Other companies now make a better product. If they upgraded the software it would be nice. Good first try.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the elderly
customer_reviews.text: i use this device to communicate with my grandma in another country. Its great! I just call and that’s it! Very simple really Other than that, I would love it to be integrated with other services or even have a sentry mode. There is so much potential por the device
customer_reviews.author: a-1

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working but can't return
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these, 1 stopped working within a few weeks of having it. Tom from support has been great to work with, but we just decided to return the units because they really weren't working the way we had hoped and now just found out we are 2 weeks outside our window. Just thought the unit would last longer than a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: TPF

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever. I have a 80 year old mother that I have bought a I phone and I pad she can not use face time. This is just so so simple. I love the photo and just hit the movie camera. WONDERFUL!!!!!!! She calls lots and we can see her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Handy, but slightly clunky software. Power Supply failed after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Handy for checking in on my special needs son. It's pretty well laid out, but the software is a little clunky. I was very happy with it, until its power supply failed after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: AverageNiceGuy

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my home. This product is complete garbage. Individual units turn off on their own and won’t turn back on. Purchased less than a year ago and 1/3 of units are broken. Poor audio. Do not buy this product. Latest firmware upgrade now won’t let me sync with Ring video doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Schaumburg

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! Nucleus anywhere is no longer in existence for the intercom system. Therefore if anything goes wrong or they stop working as in my case they will not help you. They no longer support this item!! I wasted my money on this system!!!! RIP OFF
customer_reviews.author: Candy T

customer_reviews.title: Great instant answer feature but with some limitiations
customer_reviews.text: I really like to instant answer feature that my old grandma can easily talk to me right away! However, the iphon app only allow to join one family group using one code. I bought two nucleuses, one for my A family and the other is for my B family, but I can not be listed on both of the contact lists at the same time and that really bothers me.. I have to ask for permission every time I want to talk to family members in different groups.. Hope they can fix this inflexibility soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 85 yr old mom and it easily lets her kids and grand kids chat face to face - have recommended his too a friend with a relative in a nursing home and it works great for them as well.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I wish you could do more home automation tasks on the screen without using Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: ilizardi

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Only problem is that now my son keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Only problem is that now my son keeps closing the camera on me.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Sokol

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. Does what we need.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is low. Video quality is mediocre. We decided to keep it after installing it. It's also hard to adjust the camera for different rooms if you bolt it to a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Have had to reinstall app many times Never seems to work right
customer_reviews.author: Yariv Ben-Ari

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: this stop working after a month sent it back. need more work
customer_reviews.author: and11949

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend buying.
customer_reviews.text: No more software updates for Ring doorbell. Arrived not working had to send back for another damaged used unit. It has trouble connecting all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Txfl

customer_reviews.title: Limited usefulness
customer_reviews.text: I thought these interacted better with Alexa. Not impressed with its functionality. Camera quality is fair at best.
customer_reviews.author: MurphDog

customer_reviews.title: I really like it, the only thing is it should be ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, the only thing is it should be able to be charged up not just plugged up
customer_reviews.author: Rapture Ready

customer_reviews.title: I liked the room connection and the simplicity of set up
customer_reviews.text: I liked the room connection and the simplicity of set up, the sound needs to be louder, all and all I give it a five star rating
customer_reviews.author: althea furbay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tool for our family. With 6 kids and a large historic house it's an amazing tool to allow us to communicate!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Facetime Simplified
customer_reviews.text: Peace of mind solution for checking in on elderly parents and quick video calls for parents to make. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tu Tran

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Tech That Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to set up and it works exactly as described. I am especially fond of the ability to have my cell phone receive video calls and allow me to view my kids' rooms when I'm away from home. I was shocked to receive a personal email response from Morley Ivers to a suggestion I had regarding the camera's low light performance and even more shocked to learn that a software upgrade is going to be released in a few weeks that directly addresses my concern. There are constant free updates / upgrades that painlessly install themselves, just like the Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Tonkfan

customer_reviews.title: I like the Nucleus
customer_reviews.text: I like the Nucleus, I bought 3 and then another 3 after I tried it. It has big room to grow, but it delivers what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi Kelzia

customer_reviews.title: Received devices are used and some components are lost. ...
customer_reviews.text: Received devices are used and some components are lost. Someone already setup the device before. I can't create my own account.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Liu

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not an intercom like I was looking for. Works fine as a video chat device.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Keeling

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a really affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the Nucleus for a day but I really, really like what they've done. It's clean, it's simple and the video quality is amazingly good especially since there isn't a monthly service fee. I didn't buy it for an in home intercom, my use is connecting to far flung family and connecting back home when I'm on the road. The Android and iOS apps are very good and the video quality is, again, surprisingly good. There are a few minor glitches but nothing I don't see the company being able to address as they move forward and get customer feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Peterman

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It had issues but auto updates resolved them. But it would be nice if it had a doorbell feature. update: 3/20/17 - They've added a doorbell feature. Works really well with Ring. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Christian N

customer_reviews.title: Does what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these so I could check in with my 3yo when I was somewhere else in our house with the baby. And it works great! we had tried other stuff in the past, but the auto pickup, clear video, and low latency do the trick. The product is very new, so there are a few hiccups, but the customer support regarding them has been outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Divia

customer_reviews.title: Nucleus Anywhere Intercom is a great product that keeps enhancing its capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Nucleus Anywhere Intercom is a great product that keeps enhancing its capabilities. It is so much easier than Skype or any other app for visual voicemail. It easily connects to Alexa and offers all the capabilities of that grand device.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S.

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT. I USE IT AS VIDEO PHONE TO ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT. I USE IT AS VIDEO PHONE TO TALK TO PARENTS OR TO CHECK ON BABY. SO LONG AS YOU HAVE GOOD WIFI IT WILL WORK GREAT. IF YOU HAVE PROBLEMS THEN ITS LIKELY THE WIFI NOT THE UNIT. IT ALSO HAS ALEXA, BUT WITHOUT FULL ALEXA CAPABILITIES, BUT STILL GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well and easy to set up. Excellent value and product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need improvement on the hardware.
customer_reviews.text: The video chat seem to lag, and I know it has nothing to do with my internet. Alexa isn't the same as the echo... it wont even play music from a 3rd party apps like pandora. I would says it listen better than my echo, the speaker isnt loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: V&H

customer_reviews.title: We love the dot and echo
customer_reviews.text: Responds too often when we do not say alexia.we turned it off and do not use it. We love the dot and echo.
customer_reviews.author: first time mom

customer_reviews.title: NUCLEUS ANYWHERE INTERCOMM
customer_reviews.text: This is my Third Day using the intercom and i must say it's GREAT... easy set-up , easy to use...I only had a couple of questions for the customer service and they were ansered in minutes. We bought two units and now have decided to Buy Two more units. This is my first time ever Recommending a product so I will have to say I HIGHLY RECOMMEND This intercom system. oh and also it will work with a cell phone.... Jack D
customer_reviews.author: JACK D.

customer_reviews.title: These things suck, and that's being kind
customer_reviews.text: These things suck, and that's being kind. You can BARELY and I do mean BARELY hear anything through the cheap speakers in it, AND there is NO WAY to add an external one-No Port, No 3.5mm jack, No BLUETOOTH, NOTHING! I had HIGH Hopes for these, and as much as it pains me to have to box them all back up again and return them-That's what I have to do. If you're looking for a good video intercom-save yourself a headache and find something else. This definitely isn't it. =(
customer_reviews.author: Pontiac Exchange

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, but
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, so needs some work. I bought three however, because it is useful. The mobile app has bugs, but I'm sure it will get better. I expected a little better quality in workmanship as this thing feels like a cheap plastic toy. Aside from that, I really like it. Update Still only works when it wants to. Very, VERY buggy. I will return these. Update Amazing tech support and communication team. I will hold on to these units, hoping the bugs will eventually get fixed. I want to love these things and I believe that in time, these intercoms will be commonplace.
customer_reviews.author: Thedoc

customer_reviews.title: Only works when plugged up!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed! 2 out of 3 were used and previously opened. 1 won’t even turn on. The other two only work when plugged up. No battery. It would have been nice to have known that before purchasing. Overall i really do like them.
customer_reviews.author: 4MyBoys

customer_reviews.title: Still trying to get it to communicate with the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to get it to communicate with the other intercom. Probably my fault. Have not tried hard due to the hurricanes and all the work I have to do. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Volune too low. Set up to time constrained. Returned all 4 units.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Stephanie-AZ

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. About to go out of business
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. About to go out of business. No updates in over a year and no More customer service
customer_reviews.author: ef

product_meta.title: Nucleus Anywhere Intercom with Amazon Alexa (N1001R31B)
product_meta.description:
Size:Single| Color:BlackNucleus is a family communication device that connects you with the people you love, whether they’re downstairs or across the country.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Nucleus brings you closer: Voice Activated Communication Make audio and video calls by simply saying ‘Alexa, ask Nucleus to call Kitchen

Nucleus on the go: Feel at home from anywhere Instantly connect to any Nucleus device in your home straight from our free mobile apps. 




“This new smart video intercom can do everything Amazon's Echo devices do” - Business Insider

“The Nucleus Intercom is a good option if you want a simple way to communicate with the family in a larger home, or video chat with less technically savvy loved ones.” - PC Mag

“The Nucleus integration with Alexa works exactly the same way as with Amazon Echo-- except Nucleus has a touch screen. That's helpful when, as is sometimes the case, you ask Alexa to play music only to end up yelling at it when you want it to stop, or having to unplug Echo to shut it off. Nucleus solves that pesky problem by letting you shut off or change the music by clicking on the screen if Alexa doesn't hear you.” - Inc. Magazine




Nucleus connects to Alexa, Amazon's cloud-based voice service. Just ask Alexa to listen to your favorite music, hear the news and weather reports, connect your smart home devices and more. Alexa is always getting smarter and adding new features and skills. Too busy to make dinner between work and picking up the kids? Ask Alexa for your favorite take-out spot's phone number or even order a pizza from the Domino's skill. Together, Nucleus and Alexa make the home front a little easier to manage and a lot more fun. 

 Note: When active, get Alexa's attention by tapping the Alexa button. Nucleus does not currently support Spotify and Pandora with Alexa at this time. The Alexa Voice Service is available in the US only. 

 Learn more about the Alexa Voice Service on Alexa-enabled devices.




About the Startup How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We’re building Nucleus for our families and families everywhere. Jonathan developed Nucleus to keep track of his kids around the house and to create a simpler way to stay in touch with his relatives near and far. We’ve since heard from customers that wish they could see their family members more often. ow, thanks to Nucleus, they can. 

What makes your product special?

Nucleus enables you to spend more quality time with your family, no matter where they are. We’ve heard from families all over the world that use Nucleus to call their kids down to dinner, or check in on an elderly parent that lives alone. It was designed to let you tap one button and feel like you’re in the same room with the people you love, whether that room is upstairs or across the globe. 

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

The best part has to be the wonderful and amazing stories we’ve heard from customers. We’ve had customers buy Nucleus for an aging parent in a rehab facility; for a young child that lives in a different city than her father; and for plenty of families that just want a better home intercom to make their lives a little calmer and more sane.
feature_bullets: Nucleus is a family communication device that connects you with the people you love, whether they're downstairs or across the country.

Make audio and video calls by simply asking Alexa.Plug Nucleus into power using the included DC adapter or Power over Ethernet (PoE). If you're connecting with standard etherent, plug in the ethernet cable as well the power cord.
Connects to the internet via WiFi, Ethernet, or Power over Ethernet
Designed for Everyone: We designed Nucleus with the kids and Grandma in mind, making it easier than ever to set up and just say "hello."
Chat on the go: Use the mobile app to check in with from anywhere. Please note that the Nucleus companion mobile app is compatible with iPhone 5s or later and Android 5 or later.
